verses.verse: Then Naomi <WH5281> her mother in law <WH2545> said <WH559> unto her <WH1323>, My daughter, shall I not seek <WH1245> rest <WH4494> for you <WH3190>, that it may be well with you?
And now is not Boaz <WH1162> of our relatives <WH4130>, with whose maidens <WH5291> you were <WH2219>? Behold, he winnows barley <WH8184> to night <WH3915> in the threshingfloor <WH1637>.

Wash <WH7364> yourself therefore <WH5480>, and anoint yourself <WH7760>, and put your clothes <WH8071> on <WH3381>, and get down to the floor <WH1637>: but make not yourself known <WH3045> unto the man <WH376>, until he has finished <WH3615> eating <WH398> and drinking <WH8354>.

And it shall be <WH7901>, when he lies down, that you shall mark <WH3045> the place <WH4725> where he shall lie <WH7901>, and you shall go in <WH935>, and uncover <WH1540> his feet <WH4772>, and lay down <WH7901>; and he will tell <WH5046> you what you shall do <WH6213>.
And she said <WH559> unto her <WH559>, All that you say unto me I will do <WH6213>.
And she went down <WH3381> unto the floor <WH1637>, and did <WH6213> according to all that her mother in law <WH2545> told her <WH6680>.

And when Boaz <WH1162> had eaten <WH398> and drunk <WH8354>, and his heart <WH3820> was merry <WH3190>, he went <WH935> to lie down <WH7901> at the end <WH7097> of the heap of corn <WH6194>: and she came <WH935> softly <WH3909>, and uncovered <WH1540> his feet <WH4772>, and laid down <WH7901>.
And it came to pass at midnight <WH2677>, that the man <WH376> was startled <WH2729>, and turned <WH3943>: and <WH802>, behold, a woman lay <WH7901> at his feet <WH4772>.

And he said <WH559>, Who are you <WH559>? And she answered, I am Ruth <WH7327> your handmaid <WH519>: spread <WH6566> therefore your skirt <WH3671> over your handmaid <WH519>; for you are a near kinsman <WH1350>.

And he said <WH559>, Blessed <WH1288> be you of the Lord <WH3068>, my daughter <WH1323>: for you have showed <WH3190> more kindness <WH2617> in the latter end <WH314> than at the beginning <WH7223>, inasmuch as you followed <WH3212> not <WH1115> young men <WH970>, whether poor <WH1800> or rich <WH6223>.

And now <WH1323>, my daughter, fear <WH3372> not <WH6213>; I will do for you all that you require <WH559>: for all the city <WH8179> of my people <WH5971> does know <WH3045> that you are a virtuous <WH2428> woman <WH802>.
And now it is true <WH551> that I am your near kinsman <WH1350>: but there is <WH3426> a kinsman <WH1350> nearer than I <WH7138>.

Stay <WH3885> this night <WH3915>, and it shall be in the morning <WH1242>, that if he will perform unto you the part of a kinsman <WH1350>, well <WH2896>; let him do the kinsman <WH1350>'s part: but if he will <WH2654> not do the part of a kinsman <WH1350> to you <WH1350>, then will I do the part of a kinsman to you <WH3068>, as the Lord lives <WH2416>: lie down <WH7901> until the morning <WH1242>.

And she lay <WH7901> at his feet <WH4772> until the morning <WH1242>: and she rose up <WH6965> before <WH2958> one <WH376> could see <WH5234> another <WH7453>. And he said <WH559>, Let it not be known <WH3045> that a woman <WH802> came <WH935> into the floor <WH1637>.

Also he said <WH559>, Bring <WH3051> the veil <WH4304> that you have upon you <WH270>, and hold it <WH270>. And when she held it <WH4058>, he measured six <WH8337> measures of barley <WH8184>, and laid <WH7896> it on her <WH935>: and she went into the city <WH5892>.
And when she came <WH935> to her mother in law <WH2545>, she said <WH559>, Who are you <WH1323>, my daughter? And she told <WH5046> her all that the man <WH376> had done to her <WH6213>.
And she said <WH559>, These six <WH8337> measures of barley <WH8184> gave <WH5414> he me <WH559>; for he said to me <WH935>, Go not empty <WH7387> unto your mother in law <WH2545>.

Then said <WH559> she <WH3427>, Sit still, my daughter <WH1323>, until you know <WH3045> how the matter <WH1697> will fall <WH5307>: for the man <WH376> will not be in rest <WH8252>, until <WH518> he has finished <WH3615> the thing <WH1697> this day <WH3117>.
